title: Kalaivaaniyo Raniyo Lyrics Villu Paattukaran
stanzas:
Kalaivaaniyo raniyo
aval thaan yaaro
Silai meniyo deviyo
edhu thaan pero (2)

Ava melazhagum
thanda kaalazhagum
Dhenam paarthirunthaa
villuppaattu varum

Kalaivaaniyo raniyo
aval thaan yaaro
Silai meniyo deviyo
edhu thaan pero (2)

Paadhanthodum poongolusu
thaana thanthom paada
Vedhangalum naadhangalum
vendi vanthadhu kooda

Paadhangala paarthathume
paarva valliye mele
Vedhanaigalai maathidum
ava virinja shenbaga chola

Poothathaiya poovu
adhu kaiyazhagu
Thookkuthaiya vaasam
adhu mei azhagu

Naan vanthen vaazhthi paada
Nallathai sonnen raagathoda

Kanden seethai pola
Kandathum ninnen
silaiyaip pola
Indhira logam chandhira logam
sundhara logam pottra

Kalaivaaniyo raniyo
aval thaan yaaro
Silai meniyo deviyo
edhu thaan pero (2)

Kodai mazhai kondu varum
koondhal engira megam
Jaadaiyila yethi vidum
thaagam engira mogam

Kodiyila oruthiyamma
kolamayil raani
Aadi varum poongalasam
azhagirukkum meni

Ther nadanthu theruvil
varum oorvalama.
Oor ulagil avala
pola paer varuma.

Nalla palingu pola sirippu
Manasa parikkum
pavala virippu
Vilangidaatha inippu
Vivaram purinjidaatha thudippu

Chandhira jothi vanthathu pola
Sundhara devi jolippu

Kalaivaaniyo raniyo
aval thaan yaaro
Silai meniyo deviyo

edhu thaan pero (2)
